name: An Antarctopelta Adventure
description:
Walk around in Antarctica and learn about Antarctopelta! Part 4 of the Adopt-a-Dinosaur project for EART 66.

Music: Portofino 2 by Raymond Scott

Sources:

Barreda, V., Palazzesi, L., Tellería, M., Olivero, E., Raine, J., & Forest, F. 2015. Early evolution of the angiosperm clade Asteraceae in the Cretaceous of Antarctica. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America, 112(35), 10989-10994.

Barret, P., Maidment, S., Parish, J., Thompson, R., 2012. Phylogeny of the Ankylosaurian dinosaurs (Ornithischia: Thyreophora). Journal of Systematic Paleontology, 301-312

Gasparini, Z., Salgado L.,  2006. Reappraisal of an ankylosaurian dinosaur from the Upper Cretaceous of James Ross Island (Antarctica). Geodiversitas vol. 28 119-132.
